name: Disney Violetta: Rhythm & Music
overview: Violetta: Rhythm & Music is a video game based on the hit Disney Channel teen telenovela. Players experiment with music and rhythm on their way to become a singing superstar. Tap to the rhythm of Violetta’s hottest tracks. Disney Violetta: Rhythm and Music lets you show off your rhythmic and musical abilities as you score points while watching your favorite music videos from the hit TV series. Think you know everything there is to know about Violetta? Take the Violetta quiz and prove it. Are you ready to test your coordination and timing? Challenge yourself in “Pop Music” and interact with each song like never before.
